Items.Title: Reports of Standing Committees

Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to reconcile and pass A.10163 and S.8380 and the Governor to sign into law, an act to amend the Labor Law in relation to establishing the Wage Theft Prevention Act.
Items.AgendaNote: Amended and Adopted by the Committee on Civil Service and Labor
Items.MinutesNote:
Pursuant to Rule 8.50 of the Council, The President Pro Tempore (Council Member Rivera) called for a voice vote.  

Hearing those in favor, the President Pro Tempore (Council Member Rivera) declared the Resolution to be adopted.

The following 3 Council Members formally voted against this item: Council Members Ignizio, Koo, and Oddo.

The following 2 Council Members formally abstained to vote on this item: Council Members Ulrich and Vallone, Jr.

Adopted by the Council by voice-vote.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Voice Vote.
Items.MatterName: Establishing the Wage Theft Prevention Act. (A.10163/S.8380)

Pursuant to Rule 8.50 of the Council, the President Pro Tempore (Council Member Rivera) called for a voice vote.  
Hearing those in favor, the President Pro Tempore (Council Member Rivera) declared the Resolution to be adopted.

The following 4 Council Members formally abstained to vote on this item: Council Members Halloran, Ignizio, Oddo and Vallone, Jr.

Adopted by the Council by voice-vote.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Voice Vote.
Items.MatterName: Congress to update the Federal Motor Carrier statute in the Federal Aviation Administration Authorization Act of 1994.
